org.lab99.mdt.drawable

Class PaperDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • org.lab99.mdt.drawable.PaperDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback

    public class PaperDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
implements android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback
    A wrapper Drawable to implement the material design concept.

    The drawable contains several component:

    • An original Drawable for the normal background.
    • RippleDrawable for handling the ripple effect
    • ShadowDrawable for handling the shadow beneath the view

    • Nested Class Summary

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draw on the canvas. Draw the shadow first, and then draw the original drawable, then draw the ripple effect finally.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The given canvas.

      • setDepth

        public void setDepth(float depth)
        Set the shadow depth for drawing the shadow.
        Parameters:
        depth - The depth of shadow, the effective range is from 0 to 5.

      • getRotation

        public float getRotation()
        Get the rotation value from the view.
        Returns:
        the rotation value.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float rotation)
        Set the rotation value of the view. The rotation of the attached view should be tracked, as the shadow should always be drawn under the view, in another word, the shadow should always represent the widget depth as the light is from the top, as the material design guideline said, no matter how the widget is rotated.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Set the same rotation value of the attached view.

      • setContext

        public void setContext(android.content.Context context)
        Set Context object. As Context object is required in android.support.v8.renderscript.RenderScript and Utils.getPixelFromDip(Context, float).
        Parameters:
        context - The Context object.
